name: Super Ladder Sprint - Fixed
description:
* I have accidentally uploaded the pre-final build on the official GMTK entry, but here's the fixed version for your consideration *

*More info coming soon, it has now been a rush to get the game online in time for the GMTK - jam *

Both characters are connected through the ladder. At least one of them needs to have footing on a platform or they both die ! Try to gather as many coins as you can while avoiding obstacles. Spikey balls will paralyze you, rendering the hit character unusable for 5 seconds. Exclamation boxes will kill you and end your run. Enoy !!!

Controls : 

UP/DOWN arrow key (UP controls the upper character, DOWN controls the bottom character). Alternatively, you can use your mouse and click the top half or bottom half on the screen (similar to the mobile version).
